name: Singing Stones VR
description: Singing stones VR is a quiet walk on the path of a beautiful rainforest.The game has two modes: Exploration and View. Explore by yourself all the great territory, collecting magic crystals and getting bonuses, or trust us, and we will guide you to the most beautiful places in the magical forest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1030 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX1070 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1030 MB available space
